oai_dc:dc.dc:description: From Congressman Fisher. Washington, D. C. April 7 Mrs. L. Crozier-French, Knoxville, Tenn. Dear Madam :— I am in receipt of the resolution passed at the Knox County committee of the Tennessee branch of the National Woman's Party, on March 28th, 1917, and beg to say that it is my intention, when the matter comes to a vote, to vote to give full citizen- ship to the women of our country. Yours truly, HUBERT P. FISHER.
